Rockall.text:
Wind
In south, southerly or southwesterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 at first. In north, southerly 5 to 7, veering southerly or southwesterly 3 to 5, then increasing 5 or 6 later.

Weather
In south, rain, fog patches. In north, occasional rain or drizzle.

In south, moderate occasionally very poor. In north, moderate or good, occasionally poor until later.
